xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length(.)>0"> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${name}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="contains(., ".")"> <xsl:value-of select="substring-after(., ".")" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise /> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="contains(., ".")"> <xsl:value-of select="substring-before(., ".")" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${ci name}</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length(.)>0"> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${name}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Configuration-Items> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length(//Configuration-Item) > 0"> <xsl:copy-of select="//Configuration-Item" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${configuration item}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </Configuration-Items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length(.)>0"> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${name}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Configuration-Items> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length(//Configuration-Item) > 0"> <xsl:copy-of select="//Configuration-Item" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${virtual configuration item}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </Configuration-Items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Configuration-Items> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length(//Configuration-Item) > 0"> <xsl:copy-of select="//Configuration-Item" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${configuration item}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </Configuration-Items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Configuration-Items> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length(//Configuration-Item) > 0"> <xsl:copy-of select="//Configuration-Item" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${configuration item}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </Configuration-Items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>
